bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chuang shang shui shi 瘡傷水濕 , sores harmed by water or moisture. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shang lu 商陸 quotes Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 : 瘡傷水毒：章陸根搗炙，布 裹熨之，冷即易之 , “ Sores harmed by water poison : Take zhang lu root, pound to a pulp, and roast. Wrap in fabric and apply as a hot compress [to the sores]. Change when [the compress] has cooled”.
